statements: SELECT * FROM product_categories
SELECT category_name, description FROM product_categories
SELECT id, category_name FROM product_categories WHERE id = 1
SELECT id, description FROM product_categories WHERE category_name = 'Electronics'
SELECT category_name, description FROM product_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC
SELECT * FROM product_categories WHERE id = 1;
SELECT category_name, description FROM product_categories WHERE category_name LIKE '%electronics%';
SELECT category_name, id FROM product_categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_categories WHERE id > 2 AND description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT category_name FROM product_categories WHERE id < 5;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE category_id=2;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY category ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100
SELECT product_name, category FROM products ORDER BY category DESC
SELECT * FROM categories WHERE category_name LIKE '%electronics%'
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'electronics' ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT category, COUNT(*) FROM products GROUP BY category
SELECT * FROM category;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM product WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category_name FROM product JOIN category ON product.category_id = category.category_id;
SELECT storage_location, product_name FROM storage_layout JOIN product ON storage_layout.product_id = product.product_id;
SELECT layout_id, storage_location, product_name FROM storage_layout JOIN product ON storage_layout.product_id = product.product_id;
SELECT * FROM category WHERE category_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM product WHERE category_id = 1 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT category_id, COUNT(*) AS product_count FROM product GROUP BY category_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;

SELECT c.category_name, p.product_name, s.storage_location FROM category c INNER JOIN product p ON c.category_id = p.category_id INNER JOIN storage_layout s ON p.product_id = s.product_id ORDER BY c.category_id, p.product_name DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, s.storage_location FROM product p LEFT JOIN storage_layout s ON p.product_id = s.product_id WHERE s.storage_location IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Category
SELECT id, name FROM Product
SELECT name, price FROM Product ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT description FROM Category WHERE id = 1
SELECT name, price, category_id FROM Product ORDER BY category_id
SELECT * FROM Category WHERE id = 1
SELECT name, price FROM Product WHERE category_id = 2 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT p.name, pd.weight, s.quantity FROM Product p INNER JOIN ProductDetails pd ON p.id = pd.product_id INNER JOIN Stock s ON p.id = s.product_id WHERE p.id = 3
SELECT p.name, pd.dimensions FROM Product p LEFT JOIN ProductDetails pd ON p.id = pd.product_id WHERE pd.weight > 5
SELECT * FROM Stock WHERE quantity > 10 AND location = 'Warehouse'
SELECT * FROM category;
SELECT name, price FROM product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT category_id, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM product GROUP BY category_id;
SELECT name, location FROM product INNER JOIN storage ON product.id = storage.id WHERE price > 100;
SELECT DISTINCT strategy_name FROM optimization_strategy ORDER BY strategy_name ASC;
SELECT name, price FROM product WHERE category_id = 1 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT name, category_id FROM product ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM category WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, strategy_name, description FROM optimization_strategy;
SELECT p.name AS product_name, c.name AS category_name FROM product p JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.id;
